sql.isNotNull: SELECT * FROM (SELECT N.*,ROWNUM AS R FROM (
) N ) T WHERE T.R > #paging.startRow# AND T.R <= (#paging.endRow#)

sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_G_ATTACH.NEXTVAL AS attachId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO G_ATTACH ( ATTACH_ID, ATTACH_NAME, FILE_PATH, ATT_NO, IS_DELETE, CLTNO, CLTNAME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_PERSON ) VALUES( #attachId#, #attachName#, #filePath#, #attNo#, #isDelete#, #cltno#, #cltname#, #createTime#, #createPerson# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE G_ATTACH GA SET GA.ATTACH_ID = #attachId#
GA.ATTACH_NAME = #attachName#
GA.FILE_PATH = #filePath#
GA.ATT_NO = #attNo#
GA.IS_DELETE = #isDelete#
GA.CLTNO = #cltno#
GA.CLTNAME = #cltname#
GA.CREATE_TIME = #createTime#
GA.CREATE_PERSON = #createPerson#
WHERE ATTACH_ID = #attachId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT GA.ATTACH_ID AS "attachId", GA.ATTACH_NAME AS "attachName", GA.FILE_PATH AS "filePath", GA.ATT_NO AS "attNo", GA.IS_DELETE AS "isDelete", GA.CLTNO AS "cltno", GA.CLTNAME AS "cltname", GA.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", GA.CREATE_PERSON AS "createPerson" FROM G_ATTACH GA WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY GA.ATTACH_ID ASC

SELECT GA.ATTACH_ID AS "attachId", GA.ATTACH_NAME AS "attachName", GA.FILE_PATH AS "filePath", GA.ATT_NO AS "attNo", GA.IS_DELETE AS "isDelete", GA.CLTNO AS "cltno", GA.CLTNAME AS "cltname", GA.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", GA.CREATE_PERSON AS "createPerson" FROM G_ATTACH GA WHERE GA.ATTACH_ID = #id# AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT GA.ATTACH_ID AS "attachId", GA.ATTACH_NAME AS "attachName", GA.FILE_PATH AS "filePath", GA.ATT_NO AS "attNo", GA.IS_DELETE AS "isDelete", GA.CLTNO AS "cltno", GA.CLTNAME AS "cltname", GA.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", GA.CREATE_PERSON AS "createPerson" FROM G_ATTACH GA WHERE 1 = 1
AND ROWNUM = 1
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM G_ATTACH GA WHERE GA.ATTACH_ID IN
#ids[]#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM G_ATTACH GA WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT GA.ATTACH_ID AS "attachId", GA.ATTACH_NAME AS "attachName", GA.FILE_PATH AS "filePath", GA.ATT_NO AS "attNo", GA.IS_DELETE AS "isDelete", GA.CLTNO AS "cltno", GA.CLTNAME AS "cltname", GA.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", GA.CREATE_PERSON AS "createPerson" FROM G_ATTACH GA WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY GA.ATTACH_ID ASC
sqlMap.update:
MERGE INTO G_ATTACH GA USING
SELECT
DECODE(#list[].attachId#,NULL,NULL,#list[].attachId#) AS ATTACH_ID, #list[].attachName# AS ATTACH_NAME, #list[].filePath# AS FILE_PATH, #list[].attNo# AS ATT_NO, #list[].isDelete# AS IS_DELETE, #list[].cltno# AS CLTNO, #list[].cltname# AS CLTNAME, #list[].createTime# AS CREATE_TIME, #list[].createPerson# AS CREATE_PERSON FROM DUAL
ON (A.ATTACH_ID = GA.ATTACH_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET GA.ATTACH_NAME = A.ATTACH_NAME, GA.FILE_PATH = A.FILE_PATH, GA.ATT_NO = A.ATT_NO, GA.IS_DELETE = A.IS_DELETE, GA.CLTNO = A.CLTNO, GA.CLTNAME = A.CLTNAME, GA.CREATE_TIME = A.CREATE_TIME, GA.CREATE_PERSON = A.CREATE_PERSON WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ATTACH_ID, ATTACH_NAME, FILE_PATH, ATT_NO, IS_DELETE, CLTNO, CLTNAME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_PERSON ) VALUES ( SEQ_G_ATTACH.NEXTVAL, A.ATTACH_NAME, A.FILE_PATH, A.ATT_NO, A.IS_DELETE, A.CLTNO, A.CLTNAME, A.CREATE_TIME, A.CREATE_PERSON )

MERGE INTO G_ATTACH GA USING DUAL ON (T.ATTACH_ID = #attachId#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET GA.ATTACH_NAME = #attachName#, GA.FILE_PATH = #filePath#, GA.ATT_NO = #attNo#, GA.IS_DELETE = #isDelete#, GA.CLTNO = #cltno#, GA.CLTNAME = #cltname#, GA.CREATE_TIME = #createTime#, GA.CREATE_PERSON = #createPerson# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ATTACH_ID, ATTACH_NAME, FILE_PATH, ATT_NO, IS_DELETE, CLTNO, CLTNAME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_PERSON ) VALUES ( SEQ_G_ATTACH.NEXTVAL, #attachName#, #filePath#, #attNo#, #isDelete#, #cltno#, #cltname#, #createTime#, #createPerson# )
